S04maivy_pu:430: MvyK_31 daśa māsāṃś ca nikhilān dhārayitvā mahādyutim /
S04maivy_pu:432: MvyK_32 na niṣaṇṇā nipannā vā sthitā sā brahmacāriṇī /
S04maivy_pu:435: abhrakūṭād yathā sūryo nirgataś ca prabhāyate //
S04maivy_pu:439: MvyK_35 pade pade nidhānaṃ ca padmaṃ padmaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:441: iyaṃ me paścimā jātir nāsti bhūyaḥ punarbhavaḥ //
S04maivy_pu:442: MvyK_36 na punar āgamiṣyāmi nirvāsyāmi nirāśravaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:445: śvetaṃ tasya surāś chattraṃ dhārayiṣyanti mūrdhani //
S04maivy_pu:446: MvyK_38 hṛṣṭaś caiva sahasrākṣo devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ /
S04maivy_pu:448: śriyā jvalantaṃ maitreyaṃ mātur haste pradāsyati //
S04maivy_pu:453: MvyK_41 tasmiṃś ca divase nāryo gurviṇyaḥ prasaviṣyanti /
S04maivy_pu:454: sarvās tā janayiṣyanti putrān kṣemeṇa svastinā //
S04maivy_pu:457: MvyK_43 gatidvayaṃ kumārasya yathā mantreṣu dṛśyate /
S04maivy_pu:459: MvyK_44 sa ca yauvanasaṃprāpto maitreyo hy agrapudgalaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:460: cintayiṣyati dharmātmā duḥkhitā khalv iyaṃ prajā //
S04maivy_pu:463: MvyK_46 ucchrayeṇa hastāśītiḥ kāyas tasya bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:465: MvyK_47 aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca sahasraiḥ sa puraskṛtaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:467: MvyK_48 tataḥ śaṅkho mahārājo yūpam ucchrāpayiṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:469: MvyK_49 sa taṃ yūpaṃ narapatir nānāratnavibhūṣitam /
S04maivy_pu:471: MvyK_50 tac ca ratnamayaṃ yūpaṃ dattamātraṃ manoramam /
S04maivy_pu:473: MvyK_51 tasya yūpasya maitreyo dṛṣṭvā cainām anityatām /
S04maivy_pu:475: MvyK_52 yatv ahaṃ pravrajitveha spṛśeyam amṛtaṃ padam /
S04maivy_pu:477: MvyK_53 aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca sahasraiḥ saṃpuraskṛtaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:479: MvyK_54 nāgavṛkṣas tadā tasya bodhivṛkṣo bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:482: MvyK_55 tasya mūle niṣaṇṇo 'sau maitreyo dvipadottamaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:483: anuttarāṃ ca saṃbodhiṃ prāpsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
S04maivy_pu:484: MvyK_56 aṣṭāṅgopetayā vācā tataḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:488: MvyK_58 prasannāṃ janatāṃ dṛṣṭvā satyāni kathayiṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:490: MvyK_59 supuṣpite ca udyāne sannipāto bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:492: MvyK_60 tataḥ śrutvā narapatiḥ śaṃkho nāma mahāyaśāḥ /
S04maivy_pu:494: MvyK_61 aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca sahasraiḥ sa puraskṛtaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:496: MvyK_62 tenaiva ca pramāṇena mānavānāṃ puraskṛtaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:498: MvyK_63 tato gṛhapatis tatra sudhano nāma viśrutaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:500: MvyK_64 strīratnam atha śaṃkhasya viśākhā nāma viśrutā /
S04maivy_pu:501: aśītibhiś caturbhiś ca sahasraiḥ sā puraskṛtā /
S04maivy_pu:503: MvyK_65 prāṇināṃ tatra samaye sahasrāṇi śatāni ca /
S04maivy_pu:505: MvyK_66 tataḥ kāruṇikaḥ śāstā maitreyo dvipadottamaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:507: MvyK_67 sarve te śākyamuninā muniśreṣṭhena tāyinā /
S04maivy_pu:511: kṛtvā śākyamuneḥ pūjāṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:513: dattvā śākyamuneḥ stūpe hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:514: MvyK_70 buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca gatvā tu śaraṇaṃ sadā /
S04maivy_pu:515: kṛtvā tu kuśalaṃ karma hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:517: pratipādya yathābhūtaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:518: MvyK_72 dattvā saṃghe ca dānāni cīvaraṃ pānabhojanam /
S04maivy_pu:519: vicitraṃ glānabhaiṣajyaṃ hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:522: upavāsam upoṣyeha hy āgatā mama śāsane //
S04maivy_pu:524: sarve te sāsravān dharmān kṣayayiṣyanti suratāḥ //
S04maivy_pu:533: MvyK_79 tataḥ praveśatas tasya ramyāṃ ketumatīpurīm /
S04maivy_pu:535: devatāḥ prakramiṣyanti tasmin pure gate munau //
S04maivy_pu:536: MvyK_80 catvāraś ca mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca tridaśādhipaḥ /
S04maivy_pu:537: brahma devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūjāṃ tasya vidhāsyati //
S04maivy_pu:538: MvyK_81 utpalaṃ kumudaṃ padmaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikam /
S04maivy_pu:539: aguruṃ candanaṃ caiva divyamālyaṃ tathaiva ca //
S04maivy_pu:542: MvyK_83 pathi tatra sthitā bhūmir mṛdus tūlapicūpamā /
S04maivy_pu:543: vicitraṃ ca tato mālyaṃ vikariṣyanti te pathi //
S04maivy_pu:547: MvyK_85 sa ca śakraḥ sahasrākṣo devarājo mahādyutiḥ /
S04maivy_pu:549: MvyK_86 namas te puruṣasiṃha namas te puruṣottama /
S04maivy_pu:551: MvyK_87 maharddhiko devaputras tasya māro bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:552: sa caiva prāñjaliṃ bhūtvā stoṣyate lokanāyakam //
S04maivy_pu:557: MvyK_90 ākīrṇā pṛthivī sarvā arhadbhiś ca bhaviṣyati /
S04maivy_pu:559: MvyK_91 hṛṣṭā devamanuṣyāś ca gandharvā yakṣarākṣasāḥ /
S04maivy_pu:560: śāstuḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti nāgāś cāpi maharddhikāḥ //
S04maivy_pu:561: MvyK_92 te vai nūnaṃ bhaviṣyanti akhilāś chinnasaṃśayāḥ /
S04maivy_pu:564: MvyK_93 te vai nūnaṃ bhaviṣyanti amamā aparigrahāḥ /
S04maivy_pu:567: MvyK_94 te vai nūnaṃ bhaviṣyanti chinnajālam aśaktikāḥ /
S04maivy_pu:573: vinayitvā ca saddharme tato nirvāṇam eṣyati //
S04maivy_pu:576: MvyK_98 prasādayiṣyatha cittāni tasmiṃ śākyamunau jine /
S04maivy_pu:578: MvyK_99 idam āścaryakaṃ śrutvā imām ṛddhim anuttamām /
S04maivy_pu:579: ko vidvān na prasīdeta api kṛṣṇābhijātikaḥ //
S04maivy_pu:583: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04maivy_pu:584: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
